CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Nova Exchange?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {below} Nova Exchange in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Echo Trade?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {above} Echo Trade in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Exchange relative to Ironwood Market?
SRP.A: Nova Exchange is {above} Ironwood Market in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Echo Trade}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ironwood Market}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Trade's maximum Home Sales in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Trade's maximum Home Sales is in {1961}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Trade's minimum Home Sales in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Trade's minimum Home Sales is in {1988}.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 1963 higher or lower than in 1988?
NC.A: The total home sales in 1963 was {higher} than in 1988.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 1971 higher or lower than in 1984?
NC.A: The total home sales in 1971 was {higher} than in 1984.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 1965 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total home sales in 1965 was {higher} than in 1985.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 1969 higher or lower than in 1971?
NC.A: The total home sales in 1969 was {higher} than in 1971.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Echo Trade} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Nova Exchange and Ironwood Market first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Nova Exchange and Ironwood Market first exchanged leading positions in {1964}.
